```{r}

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

list_guess <- function(n) {
  list <- sample(1:n)
  
  for(i in 1:length(list)) {
    guess <- sample(list)
    if(list[1] == guess[1]) {
      return(n - length(list) + 1)
    } else{
      list <- list[-1]

    }
  }
}

```



```{r}

cronk <- rep(c(10,20,30), 10)
map_dbl(.x = cronk, .f = list_guess,)

n <- 10
jo <- rep(NA, n)

for(i in 1:n){
  jo[i] <- list_guess(10)
}
```
